title: Can Oracle save TikTok?
description:
The popular social media video app may be banned in the U.S. but will Oracle step in to save it? Recode’s Peter Kafka explains the possible deal and what it says about Trump’s negotiations with China.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
